thread.title: Pentagon delivers draft plan to defeat Islamic State to White House
thread.title_full: Pentagon delivers draft plan to defeat Islamic State to White House

title: Pentagon delivers draft plan to defeat Islamic State to White House
text:
Politics | Mon Feb 27, 2017 | 12:28pm EST Pentagon delivers draft plan to defeat Islamic State to White House U.S. Defense Secretary James Mattis waits to welcome Canada's Minister of National Defense Harjit Sajjan at the Pentagon in Washington, U.S., February 6, 2017. REUTERS/Yuri Gripas 
WASHINGTON A Pentagon-led preliminary plan to defeat Islamic State has been delivered to the White House and U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis will brief senior administration officials later on Monday, a Defense Department spokesman told reporters. 
Pentagon spokesman Captain Jeff Davis told reporters that the it was the framework for a broader plan and looked at Islamic State around the world, not just Iraq and Syria. 
He added that Mattis would brief members of the cabinet-level Principals Committee on Monday afternoon. 
(Reporting by Idrees Ali)
